title: Hoops Tonight - Jason Timpf reacts to Netflix's "Redeem Team" documentary and shares why he thinks Kobe Bryant is "grossly" underrated, what went wrong for the 2004 USA Olympic team, and then compares the 2012 team starring LeBron James and Kobe Bryant with Michael Jordan's Dream Team from the 1992 Olympic Games.
